report.name: Reporte -DUGAD: Curso Actividades
report.components: SELECT DISTINCT u.username, CONCAT( u.firstname, ' ', u.lastname ) AS NAME, ic.shortname AS "Course Code", CONCAT('%%WWWROOT%%/user/view.php%%Q%%id=', u.id, '&course=', ic.id) AS "Link course" FROM prefix_course ic JOIN prefix_context con ON con.instanceid = ic.id JOIN prefix_role_assignments ra ON con.id = ra.contextid AND con.contextlevel = 50 JOIN prefix_role r ON ra.roleid = r.id JOIN prefix_user u ON u.id = ra.userid LEFT JOIN prefix_groups_members gm ON u.id = gm.userid WHERE ic.visible = 1 AND gm.userid IS NULL AND r.id NOT IN (3,4) AND ic.id = %%COURSEID%% ORDER BY ic.shortname
